Name: Absorb
Description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
ChineseDescription: 吸取对方的养分。攻击造成的一半伤害会转化成自己的HP。

Name: Aerial Ace
Description: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes.
ChineseDescription: 以迅捷的速度玩弄对方后斩切，攻击必定会命中。

Name: Air Cutter
Description: The user launches razor-like wind to slash the opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.
ChineseDescription: 用锐利的风切割对方。容易击中要害。

Name: Air Slash
Description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky.
ChineseDescription: 制造空气之刃切裂对方。有时会使对方退缩。

Name: Ancient Power
Description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power.
ChineseDescription: 用原始的力量攻击对方。有时会提升自身所有的能力。

Name: Aqua Jet
Description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible.
ChineseDescription: 用眼睛无法跟上的速度接近对方攻击。必定能够先制攻击。

Name: Aqua Tail
Description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.
ChineseDescription: 如狂暴的海浪般挥舞尾巴，强力攻击对方。

Name: Blizzard
Description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon.
ChineseDescription: 用暴风雪攻击对方，有时会使对方冰冻。

Name: Body Slam
Description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight.
ChineseDescription: 用自己的身体，压住对方进行攻击。有时会使对方麻痹。

Name: Bone Club
Description: The user clubs the target with a bone.
ChineseDescription: 用手中的骨头殴打对方。有时会使对方退缩。

Name: Brick Break
Description: The user attacks with a swift chop.
ChineseDescription: 用手刀进行致命一击，可以击碎光墙和减半反射。

Name: Brine
Description: If the target's HP is half or less, this attack will hit with double the power.
ChineseDescription: 当对方的HP低于一半时，我方招式威力翻倍。

Name: Bubble Beam
Description: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target.
ChineseDescription: 喷射大量的泡沫攻击对方。有时会降低对方的速度。

Name: Bug Buzz
Description: The user vibrates its wings to generate a damaging sound wave.
ChineseDescription: 用独特方式振动翅膀，发出声音攻击对方。有时会降低对方的特防。

Name: Bulldoze
Description: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground.
ChineseDescription: 用力踩踏地面，攻击全场。降低对方的速度。

Name: Cross Chop
Description: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. Critical hits land more easily.
ChineseDescription: 交叉绞杀对方进行攻击。容易击中要害。

Name: Cross Poison
Description: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.
ChineseDescription: 用毒刃将对方斩裂。有时会使对方中毒，且容易击中要害。

Name: Dark Pulse
Description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts.
ChineseDescription: 从体内放射出充满恶意的光环。有时会使对方退缩。

Name: Dazzling Gleam
Description: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.
ChineseDescription: 发射出充满力量的光芒攻击对方。

Name: Dig
Description: The user burrows, then attacks on the next turn.
ChineseDescription: 首回合钻入地下，下一回合攻击对方。可以用于脱离洞穴。

Name: Disarming Voice
Description: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon.
ChineseDescription: 发出迷人的声音，给予对方精神上的伤害。必定能命中目标。

Name: Discharge
Description: The user strikes everything around it by letting loose a flare of electricity.
ChineseDescription: 用猛烈的电流进行全体攻击。有时会使对方麻痹。

Name: Double Slap
Description: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.
ChineseDescription: 用反复拍打的方式攻击，连续攻击对方2～5次。

Name: Dragon Claw
Description: The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws.
ChineseDescription: 用锐利的巨爪切裂对方攻击。

Name: Dragon Pulse
Description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.
ChineseDescription: 从口中喷射出巨大的冲击波攻击对方。

Name: Draining Kiss
Description: The user steals the target's energy with a kiss. The user's HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.
ChineseDescription: 用一个吻窃取对方的能量，伤害的75%回复自身HP。

Name: Drill Peck
Description: A corkscrewing attack with a sharp beak acting as a drill.
ChineseDescription: 用旋转的尖喙刺击对方。

Name: Drill Run
Description: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.
ChineseDescription: 像电钻一样旋转身体旋转身体攻击对方。容易击中要害。

Name: Earthquake
Description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.
ChineseDescription: 引发地震，攻击周围的所有对象。

Name: Fire Blast
Description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire.
ChineseDescription: 用爆成大字的火焰灼烧对方。有时会使对方灼伤。

Name: Fire Punch
Description: The target is punched with a fiery fist.
ChineseDescription: 用附带着火焰的拳头攻击对方。有时会使对方灼伤。

Name: Flame Burst
Description: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame.
ChineseDescription: 向对方发射击中后会爆裂的火焰。爆裂的火焰会飞溅到对方身旁的神奇宝贝上。

Name: Flame Charge
Description: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks.
ChineseDescription: 让身体缠绕火焰攻击对方。能够提升自身的速度。

Name: Flame Wheel
Description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target.
ChineseDescription: 用火焰缠绕身体向对方进行突击。有时会使对方灼伤。

Name: Flamethrower
Description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire.
ChineseDescription: 用炙热火焰攻击对方。有时会使对方灼伤。

Name: Flash Cannon
Description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once.
ChineseDescription: 收集身体的光芒聚集在一点释放出去。有时会降低对方的特防。

Name: Giga Drain
Description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target..
ChineseDescription: 吸取养分的攻击。伤害的一半转化成自己的HP。

Name: Gunk Shot
Description: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack.
ChineseDescription: 用超级脏的垃圾攻击对方。有时会使对方中毒。

Name: Headbutt
Description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target.
ChineseDescription: 冲向对方，用头进行攻击。有时会使对方退缩。

Name: Heart Stamp
Description: The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act makes the target less wary.
ChineseDescription: 以可爱的样子迷惑对手，再给予对手致命一击。有时会使对方退缩。

Name: Heat Wave
Description: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the opposing Pokémon.
ChineseDescription: 向对方吹出灼热的风进行攻击。有时会使对方灼伤。

Name: Horn Attack
Description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.
ChineseDescription: 用锋利的尖角攻击对方。

Name: Hurricane
Description: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky.
ChineseDescription: 用强烈的风席卷对方。有时会使对方混乱。

Name: Hydro Pump
Description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.
ChineseDescription: 向对方喷射高压水柱进行攻击。

Name: Hyper Beam
Description: The target is attacked with a powerful beam.
ChineseDescription: 放出强光攻击对方。下一回合无法行动。

Name: Hyper Fang
Description: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs.
ChineseDescription: 用锐利的牙齿攻击对方，有时会使对方退缩。

Name: Ice Beam
Description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy.
ChineseDescription: 用极冷的光束攻击对方。有时会使对方冰冻。

Name: Ice Punch
Description: The target is punched with an icy fist.
ChineseDescription: 用附带着冷气的拳头攻击对方。有时会使对方冰冻。

Name: Icy Wind
Description: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air.
ChineseDescription: 放出冷气攻击对方，降低对方的速度。

Name: Iron Head
Description: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head.
ChineseDescription: 用钢铁般坚硬的头部撞击对方。有时会使对方退缩。

Name: Leaf Blade
Description: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily..
ChineseDescription: 用刃叶切割对方容易击中要害。

Name: Low Sweep
Description: The user makes a swift attack on the target's legs, which lowers the target's Speed stat.
ChineseDescription: 利用迅猛的动作攻击对方的脚部。降低对方的速度。

Name: Magnet Bomb
Description: The user launches steel bombs that stick to the target.
ChineseDescription: 发射能够追踪对方的钢铁炸弹。攻击必定会命中。

Name: Mega Drain
Description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target..
ChineseDescription: 吸取对方的养分。攻击造成的一半伤害会转化成自己的HP。

Name: Megahorn
Description: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.
ChineseDescription: 用致命的大角狠狠地突刺对方。

Name: Moonblast
Description: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target.
ChineseDescription: 借用月亮的力量攻击对方，有一定几率降低对方的特殊攻击能力。

Name: Mud Bomb
Description: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack.
ChineseDescription: 发射坚硬的泥弹攻击对方。有时会降低对方的命中。

Name: Night Slash
Description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily..
ChineseDescription: 瞬间瞄准对方盲区攻击。容易击中要害。

Name: Ominous Wind
Description: The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive wind.
ChineseDescription: 吹出可怕的强风，攻击对方。有时会提升自身的全部能力。

Name: Parabolic Charge
Description: The user attacks everything around it.
ChineseDescription: 攻击周围所有单位，伤害的一半回复自身HP。

Name: Petal Blizzard
Description: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks everything around it.
ChineseDescription: 刮起强烈的花瓣飞雪，攻击周身所有神奇宝贝。

Name: Play Rough
Description: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it.
ChineseDescription: 通过撒野攻击对方，有一定几率降低对方的攻击能力。

Name: Poison Fang
Description: The user bites the target with toxic fangs.
ChineseDescription: 用毒牙啃咬攻击对方。有时会使对方中剧毒。

Name: Power Gem
Description: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.
ChineseDescription: 释放出如宝石般的光芒攻击对方。

Name: Power Whip
Description: The user violently whirls its vines or tentacles to harshly lash the target.
ChineseDescription: 激烈地挥动触手或者藤蔓攻击对方。

Name: Psybeam
Description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray.
ChineseDescription: 发射不可思议的光线攻击对方。有时会使对方混乱。

Name: Psychic
Description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force.
ChineseDescription: 通过强大的念力攻击对方。

Name: Psyshock
Description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target.
ChineseDescription: 将神秘的念力波动实体化攻击对方。给与对方物理伤害。

Name: Psystrike
Description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target.
ChineseDescription: 将不可思议的念力波动实体化攻击对方。给与对方物理伤害。

Name: Rest
Description: The user goes to sleep for two turns.
ChineseDescription: 睡上两个回合。能够回复全部HP，且清除异常状态。

Name: Rock Slide
Description: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing Pokémon to inflict damage.
ChineseDescription: 用力将巨石砸向对方。有时会使对方退缩。

Name: Rock Tomb
Description: Boulders are hurled at the target.
ChineseDescription: 投出岩石攻击。可封住对方的行动，降低对方的速度。

Name: Scald
Description: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target.
ChineseDescription: 发射沸腾炙热的水攻击对方。有时会使对方灼伤。

Name: Seed Bomb
Description: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds on the target from above.
ChineseDescription: 用外壳坚硬的巨大种子，从上方攻击对方。

Name: Shadow Ball
Description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target.
ChineseDescription: 扔出一团黑影攻击对方。有时会降低对方的特防。

Name: Shadow Punch
Description: The user throws a punch from the shadows.
ChineseDescription: 用暗影之拳攻击对方。攻击必定会命中。

Name: Shadow Sneak
Description: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind.
ChineseDescription: 伸长影子，从对方的背后攻击对方。必定能够先制攻击。

Name: Signal Beam
Description: The user attacks with a sinister beam of light.
ChineseDescription: 放出神秘的光线攻击对方。有时会使对方混乱。

Name: Slam
Description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the like to inflict damage.
ChineseDescription: 使用长尾巴或者藤蔓攻击对方。

Name: Slash
Description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily..
ChineseDescription: 用利爪或镰刀等切裂对方。容易击中要害。

Name: Sludge
Description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target.
ChineseDescription: 投掷淤泥攻击对方。有时会使对方中毒。

Name: Sludge Bomb
Description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target.
ChineseDescription: 向对方扔出肮脏的淤泥。有时会使对方中毒。

Name: Sludge Wave
Description: The user strikes everything around it by swamping the area with a giant sludge wave.
ChineseDescription: 使用淤泥波浪攻击全场。有时会使对方中毒。

Name: Smog
Description: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases.
ChineseDescription: 放出毒气攻击对方。有时会使对方中毒。

Name: Solar Beam
Description: A two-turn attack.
ChineseDescription: 首回合储蓄能量，下一回合发射光线攻击对方。

Name: Stomp
Description: The target is stomped with a big foot.
ChineseDescription: 用巨大的脚踩踏对方进行攻击。有时会使对方退缩。

Name: Stone Edge
Description: The user stabs the target with sharpened stones from below. Critical hits land more easily..
ChineseDescription: 用尖锐的岩石攻击对方。容易击中要害。

Name: Struggle
Description: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon.
ChineseDescription: 在PP耗尽后，使出所有剩余力量攻击的招式。自己也会受到一点伤害。

Name: Submission
Description: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground.
ChineseDescription: 让对方和自己一起摔到地面上造成伤害。自己也会受到一点伤害。

Name: Swift
Description: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing Pokémon.
ChineseDescription: 发射星型的光攻击对方。攻击必定会命中。

Name: Take Down
Description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target.
ChineseDescription: 使出全身的力气，向对方冲撞过去。自己也会受到一点伤害。

Name: Thunder
Description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage.
ChineseDescription: 使用强大的雷暴攻击对方。有时会使对方麻痹。

Name: Thunder Punch
Description: The target is punched with an electrified fist.
ChineseDescription: 用附带着电气的拳头攻击对方。有时会使对方麻痹。

Name: Thunderbolt
Description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target.
ChineseDescription: 用强大的电流攻击对方。有时会使对方麻痹。

Name: Twineedle
Description: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes.
ChineseDescription: 用锋利的双针连续攻击对方2次。有时会使对方中毒。

Name: Twister
Description: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the opposing Pokémon.
ChineseDescription: 制造旋风将对方卷入进行攻击。有时会使对方退缩。

Name: Vice Grip
Description: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.
ChineseDescription: 将对方从两边夹起来给与伤害。

Name: Water Pulse
Description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water.
ChineseDescription: 以水的震动给予对方攻击，有时会使对方混乱。

Name: Wrap
Description: A long body or vines are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.
ChineseDescription: 使用长长的身体和藤蔓缠绕对方4～5回合造成伤害。

Name: X-Scissor
Description: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.
ChineseDescription: 用镰刀或爪子交叉切裂对方。

Name: Acid
Description: The opposing Pokémon is attacked with a spray of harsh acid.
ChineseDescription: 向对方喷射强酸进行攻击。有时会降低对方的特防。

Name: Bite
Description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs.
ChineseDescription: 用尖銳的牙咬住對手進行攻擊。有時會使對手畏縮。

Name: Bug Bite
Description: The user bites the target.
ChineseDescription: 啃咬攻击。可以夺取对方的树果并立刻使用。

Name: Bullet Punch
Description: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets.
ChineseDescription: 像子弹般快速击出钢铁之拳。必定能够先制攻击。

Name: Cut
Description: The target is cut with a scythe or claw.
ChineseDescription: 用刀刃或爪子切割对方进行攻击。还能切断比较细的树。

Name: Dragon Breath
Description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage.
ChineseDescription: 吐出强烈的气息攻击对方。有时会使对方麻痹。

Name: Ember
Description: The target is attacked with small flames.
ChineseDescription: 向對手發射細小的火焰來攻擊。有时会使对方灼伤。

Name: Frost Breath
Description: The user blows its cold breath on the target.
ChineseDescription: 暂无招式说明

Name: Fury Cutter
Description: The target is slashed with scythes or claws.
ChineseDescription: 用利刃攻击对方。连续击中对方的话，威力会上升。

Name: Ice Shard
Description: The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target.
ChineseDescription: 快速地释放出冰块攻击对方。必定能够先制攻击。

Name: Karate Chop
Description: The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily..
ChineseDescription: 用强劲的手刀击打对方。容易击中要害。

Name: Lick
Description: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage.
ChineseDescription: 用长舌头舔对方进行攻击。有时会使对方麻痹。

Name: Low Kick
Description: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over.
ChineseDescription: 使劲踹对方的脚，让对方摔倒。对方越重威力越大。

Name: Metal Claw
Description: The target is raked with steel claws.
ChineseDescription: 用钢铁之爪攻击对方。有时会提升自身的攻击。

Name: Mud Shot
Description: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target.
ChineseDescription: 将凝固的水泥，投掷出去攻击对方。降低对方的速度。

Name: Peck
Description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.
ChineseDescription: 用尖锐的喙或角刺击对方。

Name: Poison Jab
Description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison.
ChineseDescription: 用带毒的触手攻击对方。有时会使对方中毒。

Name: Pound
Description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a foreleg, or the like.
ChineseDescription: 用长尾巴或长手拍打对方。

Name: Psycho Cut
Description: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. Critical hits land more easily..
ChineseDescription: 用实体化的精神利刃切割对方，容易击中要害。

Name: Quick Attack
Description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible.
ChineseDescription: 高速接近对方进行攻击。必定能够先制攻击。

Name: Razor Leaf
Description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily..
ChineseDescription: 使用叶片攻击对方。容易击中要害。

Name: Rock Throw
Description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.
ChineseDescription: 向对方扔出石块进行攻击。

Name: Scratch
Description: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.
ChineseDescription: 用坚硬的利爪攻击对方。

Name: Shadow Claw
Description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily..
ChineseDescription: 用锐利的影之爪攻击对方。容易击中要害。

Name: Spark
Description: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target.
ChineseDescription: 暂无招式说明

Name: Splash
Description: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all.
ChineseDescription: 毫无攻击力地乱跳。似乎什么都不会发生……

Name: Steel Wing
Description: The target is hit with wings of steel.
ChineseDescription: 用坚硬的翅膀攻击对方。有时会提升自身的防御。

Name: Sucker Punch
Description: This move enables the user to attack first.
ChineseDescription: 对方使用攻击招式时可以优先攻击。对方不攻击则失败。

Name: Tackle
Description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.
ChineseDescription: 使出全身的力气，撞击对方。

Name: Thunder Shock
Description: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to inflict damage.
ChineseDescription: 用电流攻击对方。有时会使对方麻痹。

Name: Vine Whip
Description: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.
ChineseDescription: 使用如同鞭子般细长的藤蔓抽打对方进行攻击。

Name: Water Gun
Description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.
ChineseDescription: 向對手發射強力水柱來攻擊。

Name: Wing Attack
Description: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.
ChineseDescription: 用展开的大翅膀攻击对方。

Name: Bubble
Description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing Pokémon.
ChineseDescription: 发出无数的泡泡攻击对方。有时会降低对方的速度。

Name: Confusion
Description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force.
ChineseDescription: 用微弱的念力攻击对方。有时会使对方混乱。

Name: Feint Attack
Description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch.
ChineseDescription: 趁对方不注意接近然后发动攻击。攻击必定会命中。

Name: Fire Fang
Description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs.
ChineseDescription: 用充满火焰的牙撕咬对方。有时会使对方灼伤或退缩。

Name: Mud Slap
Description: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.
ChineseDescription: 向对方的脸投掷泥块攻击，降低对方的命中。

Name: Poison Sting
Description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger.
ChineseDescription: 用锋利的毒针攻击对方。有时会使对方中毒。

Name: Rock Smash
Description: The user attacks with a punch.
ChineseDescription: 用能击碎石头的拳头攻击对方。有时会使对方的防御下降。

Name: Zen Headbutt
Description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target.
ChineseDescription: 将念力集中在前额攻击。有时会使对方退缩。

Name: Acid
Description: The opposing Pokémon is attacked with a spray of harsh acid.
ChineseDescription: 向对方喷射强酸进行攻击。有时会降低对方的特防。

Name: Bite
Description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs.
ChineseDescription: 用尖銳的牙咬住對手進行攻擊。有時會使對手畏縮。

Name: Bug Bite
Description: The user bites the target.
ChineseDescription: 啃咬攻击。可以夺取对方的树果并立刻使用。

Name: Bullet Punch
Description: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets.
ChineseDescription: 像子弹般快速击出钢铁之拳。必定能够先制攻击。

Name: Cut
Description: The target is cut with a scythe or claw.
ChineseDescription: 用刀刃或爪子切割对方进行攻击。还能切断比较细的树。

Name: Dragon Breath
Description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage.
ChineseDescription: 吐出强烈的气息攻击对方。有时会使对方麻痹。

Name: Ember
Description: The target is attacked with small flames.
ChineseDescription: 向對手發射細小的火焰來攻擊。有时会使对方灼伤。

Name: Frost Breath
Description: The user blows its cold breath on the target.
ChineseDescription: 暂无招式说明

Name: Fury Cutter
Description: The target is slashed with scythes or claws.
ChineseDescription: 用利刃攻击对方。连续击中对方的话，威力会上升。

Name: Ice Shard
Description: The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target.
ChineseDescription: 快速地释放出冰块攻击对方。必定能够先制攻击。

Name: Karate Chop
Description: The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily..
ChineseDescription: 用强劲的手刀击打对方。容易击中要害。

Name: Lick
Description: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage.
ChineseDescription: 用长舌头舔对方进行攻击。有时会使对方麻痹。

Name: Low Kick
Description: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over.
ChineseDescription: 使劲踹对方的脚，让对方摔倒。对方越重威力越大。

Name: Metal Claw
Description: The target is raked with steel claws.
ChineseDescription: 用钢铁之爪攻击对方。有时会提升自身的攻击。

Name: Mud Shot
Description: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target.
ChineseDescription: 将凝固的水泥，投掷出去攻击对方。降低对方的速度。

Name: Peck
Description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.
ChineseDescription: 用尖锐的喙或角刺击对方。

Name: Poison Jab
Description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison.
ChineseDescription: 用带毒的触手攻击对方。有时会使对方中毒。

Name: Pound
Description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a foreleg, or the like.
ChineseDescription: 用长尾巴或长手拍打对方。

Name: Psycho Cut
Description: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. Critical hits land more easily..
ChineseDescription: 用实体化的精神利刃切割对方，容易击中要害。

Name: Quick Attack
Description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible.
ChineseDescription: 高速接近对方进行攻击。必定能够先制攻击。

Name: Razor Leaf
Description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily..
ChineseDescription: 使用叶片攻击对方。容易击中要害。

Name: Rock Throw
Description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.
ChineseDescription: 向对方扔出石块进行攻击。

Name: Scratch
Description: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.
ChineseDescription: 用坚硬的利爪攻击对方。

Name: Shadow Claw
Description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily..
ChineseDescription: 用锐利的影之爪攻击对方。容易击中要害。

Name: Spark
Description: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target.
ChineseDescription: 暂无招式说明

Name: Splash
Description: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all.
ChineseDescription: 毫无攻击力地乱跳。似乎什么都不会发生……

Name: Steel Wing
Description: The target is hit with wings of steel.
ChineseDescription: 用坚硬的翅膀攻击对方。有时会提升自身的防御。

Name: Sucker Punch
Description: This move enables the user to attack first.
ChineseDescription: 对方使用攻击招式时可以优先攻击。对方不攻击则失败。

Name: Tackle
Description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.
ChineseDescription: 使出全身的力气，撞击对方。

Name: Thunder Shock
Description: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to inflict damage.
ChineseDescription: 用电流攻击对方。有时会使对方麻痹。

Name: Vine Whip
Description: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.
ChineseDescription: 使用如同鞭子般细长的藤蔓抽打对方进行攻击。

Name: Water Gun
Description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.
ChineseDescription: 向對手發射強力水柱來攻擊。

Name: Wing Attack
Description: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.
ChineseDescription: 用展开的大翅膀攻击对方。
